# Branding

ClawDE brand assets and guidelines for contributors, integrators, and press.

## Pages

- [[Branding/Guide|Brand Guide]] -- colors, typography, usage rules
- [[Branding/Assets|Asset Index]] -- full inventory of logos, icons, and favicons

## Quick reference

| Element | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Primary red | `#dc2626` (Tailwind `red-600`) |
| Dark background | `#000000` / `#060608` |
| Wordmark font | Inter 800 (Extra Bold) |
| Mono font | JetBrains Mono |
| Icon shape | Claw mark, square, transparent background |
| Favicon | Multi-size ICO (16/32/48/64) |

## Files

All source PNGs live in `.github/wiki/brand/`. Copy from there into `web/`, Flutter assets, or any other consumer. The wiki folder is the single source of truth for brand images.
